sentence.text: Late onset of clinical symptoms in hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation) results in late diagnosis and poor disease outcome.

We used the Illumina HumanMethylation450 BeadChip microarray to test whether white blood cell DNA, an easily accessible source of DNA, exhibits site-specific changes in DNA methylation in blood of diagnosed phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation patients (post-diagnostic, 24 cases, 24 controls) and in prospectively collected blood specimens of HCC patients who were cancer-free at blood collection (pre-diagnostic, 21 cases, 21 controls).
We established for the first time 9 probes that could distinguish HBV-negative cirrhotic patients who subsequently developed phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation from those who stayed cancer-free.
